name: JivoChat
headline: With a few clicks, access the services of chats, e-mails and calls in one place.
overview:
JivoChat is a complete online store messenger focused on conversion and retention. Allows you to communicate with visitors and customers from anywhere: Chat, Phone, Callback, Email, Facebook Messenger, Telegram and Viber.
Operators receive all chats, emails and calls in one Jivo app, so they no longer have to switch between multiple windows and can be used on both mobile and computer, meaning fewer distractions and all the tools you need. for exceptional customer support.
